Name: assign_worker_to_task
Description: Binary decision whether to assign a specific worker to a specific task.

Name: assign_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary decision whether to include a specific user story in a specific sprint.

Name: assign_team_to_project
Description: Binary decision whether to assign a specific team to a specific project.

Name: select_feature_for_release
Description: Binary decision whether to include a specific feature in a specific release plan.

Name: set_sprint_backlog_effort
Description: Integer variable for the total planned effort (in story points) for a sprint backlog.

Name: set_team_size
Description: Integer variable to determine the number of members in a team.

Name: schedule_release_date
Description: Integer variable representing the planned release date (e.g.

Name: update_task_status
Description: Categorical variable to set the status of a task.

Name: prioritize_feature
Description: Integer variable to set or adjust the priority of a feature in the product backlog.

Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary decision whether to assign a specific worker to a specific team.

Name: set_project_budget
Description: Floating point variable to allocate a specific budget to a project.

Name: approve_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Binary decision to mark a sprint goal as achieved or not achieved.
